org.deeplearning4j.nn.api

Interface LayerFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BatchNormalizationLayerFactory, ConvolutionLayerFactory, DefaultLayerFactory, GravesBidirectionalLSTMLayerFactory, GravesLSTMLayerFactory, GRULayerFactory, ImageLSTMLayerFactory, LocalResponseNormalizationFactory, PretrainLayerFactory, RecursiveAutoEncoderLayerFactory, SubsampleLayerFactory

    public interface LayerFactory
    Common interface for creating neural network layers.
